title: Yevgeny Prigozhin Says Russia Is Interfering in the US Midterm Elections
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin, a prominent businessman who founded a private mercenary force closely linked to the Kremlin, posted a sardonic statement about election meddling.
dc:creator: Dan Bilefsky and Ivan Nechepurenko
media:description: Yevgeny V. Prigozhin, a Russian businessman and the founder of the private military force the Wagner Group, in Saint Petersburg, Russia, in 2016.
